homeHeader.title: From Setup to Operations, Launch Your Business in Dubai Airport Free Zone with Complete 360° Support
homeHeader.description: Navigate the UAE’s complex licensing and regulatory landscape confidently with our seasoned business consultants. Tap into Dubai Airport Free Zone’s (DAFZ) thriving ecosystem of 2,000+ global brands, 2.5 billion consumer base, and state-of-the-art airside facilities custom-built to maximise logistics efficiency and minimise overheads. Partner with our specialists to streamline company formation in DAFZ and fast-track your access to global markets today!

leftSection_5.title: Streamline Dubai Airport Free Zone Company Formation in 5 Steps

items.title: Book a Consultation
items.description: We’ll start by discussing your business needs to suggest the ideal legal entity and business activity.

items.title: Prepare Your Documents
items.description: Next, our specialists will help you compile and review all the required documents to streamline the paperwork.

items.title: Submit Your Application
items.description: We’ll handle all the company registration paperwork and pay the licensing fees to issue your trade license.

items.title: Set up Your DAFZ Business
items.description: Once DAFZA approves your application, we’ll send your license and certificate of registration your way.

items.title: Secure Your Visa
items.description: Lastly, we’ll provide you with personalised guidance to apply for investor, residence, or employment visas.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to issue a trade license in DAFZA?
items.answer: Our experts streamline all the paperwork and government back-and-forth to help obtain your business license within 1-7 working days.

items.question: Do I have to pay any taxes in DAFZ, Dubai?
items.answer: Dubai Airport Free Zone offers 100% tax exemptions on capital and personal income, as well as import and export customs. You might have to pay VATs, depending on your selected business activity and license.

items.question: Will I need a local sponsor to launch my DAFZ business?
items.answer: No, DAFZ offers 100% foreign ownership, allowing you to retain full control of your business without needing a UAE national partner.

items.question: Do I need to lease a physical office in the Dubai Airport Free Zone?
items.answer: No, the region offers alternatives, including flexi-desk, co-working, and virtual office, empowering you to save up on leasing.

items.question: Can One Nexuz guarantee the opening of a corporate bank account in DAFZ?
items.answer: Yes, our business consultants connect you with the ideal bank partner to expedite personal or corporate bank account in DAFZ to simplify financing.
